burlap.behavior.singleagent.auxiliary.valuefunctionvis.common

Interface ColorBlend

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LandmarkColorBlendInterpolation

    public interface ColorBlend
    An interface for defining methods that return a color for a given double value.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Color color(double v)
      Returns a Color for a given double value
      void rescale(double minV, double maxV)
      Tells this object the minimum value and the maximum value it can receive.

    • Method Detail

      • color

        Color color(double v)
        Returns a Color for a given double value
        Parameters:
        v - the input double value
        Returns:
        a Color for a given double value

      • rescale

        void rescale(double minV,
             double maxV)
        Tells this object the minimum value and the maximum value it can receive.
        Parameters:
        minV - the minimum value
        maxV - the maximum value
